TriggerOraclev10g.name: OPTION_BI
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
begin
if :new.option_ID is null
then
select SQ_option.nextval into :new.option_ID from dual;
end if;

/* Fill date and user created */
IF :NEW.created_on IS NULL
THEN
:NEW.created_on := SYSDATE;
END IF;

IF :NEW.created_by IS NULL
THEN
:NEW.created_by := UPPER(sys_context('USERENV', 'OS_USER'));
ELSE
:NEW.created_by := UPPER(:NEW.created_by);
END IF;
end;
